What is the maximum number of Cthulhu Mythos skill points gained from the book?
MR—Mythos Rating – reader may gain maximum CMF if their Cthulhu Mythos skills points are below the book’s rating (see page 175)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the number of Cthulhu Mythos skill points gained from an initial reading?
CMI—Cthulhu Mythos Initial – number of Cthulhu Mythos skill points gained from an initial reading.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the number of Cthulhu Mythos skill points gained from a full study?
CMF—Cthulhu Mythos Full – number of Cthulhu Mythos skill points gained from a full study.
